pos_mean_info_list.mean: 慈善事业的；慷慨的，仁慈的；宽恕的

word_group.brief_definition: 当地慈善机构；地方慈善机构；地方慈善团体
公共慈善机构；公益慈善机构；公益慈善事业
慈善信笺；慈善事业的信笺；慈善的信头

bilingual.target: 瑞安的慈善工作并不罕见。

bilingual.source: All of the money will go to charity.
bilingual.target: 所有的钱都会捐给慈善机构。

bilingual.source: What is the most important animal charity in the UK?
bilingual.target: 英国最重要的动物慈善机构是什么？

bilingual.source: Crowds of people turned out to watch the charity performance.
bilingual.target: 大批人群出来观看慈善表演。

bilingual.source: Her next goal is to start a charity website to raise money for children in poor countries.
bilingual.target: 她的下一个目标是创建一个慈善网站，为贫困国家的儿童筹集资金。
他们向慈善机构捐了钱。
她在一家慈善机构做志愿者工作。
牧师组织了一个慈善活动。

bilingual.source: There is a charity bazaar this weekend.
bilingual.target: 这个周末有一个慈善义卖。

bilingual.source: He gave all his money to charity.
bilingual.target: 他把全部的钱都捐给了慈善机构。

yingyinNormal.en: Why would a charity give away a free boat? I don't know. Charity? Well, just buy the damn boat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 慈善团体为什么要送帆船？我哪知，做慈善吗？你就买吧。

yingyinNormal.en: She has a charity event at 5:00, but they're not serving food.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她五点要参加一个慈善活动，但他们不管饭。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't race cars. I don't make popcorn. None of my proceeds go to charity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会赛车或做爆米花，也不会捐钱给慈善团体。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I'm sorry, no. No, I'm not some like sloppy second, you know charity band.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对不起，不不，我可不是什么二流的慈善乐团。

yingyinNormal.en: Seriously, don't even give them to charity. You won't be helping anyone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说真的，甚至不要把它们捐作慈善，你这不是在帮助任何人。

yingyinNormal.en: You're going to issue a statement saying that you're giving a million dollars to charity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要发表一项声明宣布将一百万美元捐作慈善。

yingyinNormal.en: No, but it's good. You know, I'm gonna take some time off and do charity work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，但那很好，你知道，我要休息一段时间做一些慈善工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you sure? We may have something at Louis Vuitton. Screw charity work. What do you got?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你肯定？我想我们现在需要人手。慈善工作，你们有什么?

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hey. Ross, listen can you come to a charity event tonight? Oh no, I have plans with Elizabeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯，你晚上可以参加慈善晚会吗？不行，我跟伊丽莎白有约。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, well, when you're done with your charity work, why don't you come find me? I'll be at Tory Burch looking at ponchos.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那好吧，你的慈善工作完毕之后过来找我？我去托利布奇那看看披风。

yingyinNormal.en: Two weeks ago, Wilkins left a lucrative job in the tech sector to found a new charity called O.T.P.S.
yingyinNormal.zh: 两周前，威尔金斯辞去了收入颇丰的技术职务，创建了一个慈善组织，名叫OTPS。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, right, the unemployed piano player who gave his trust fund to charity? I'm splitting the muffin with him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是喔，那个把信托基金全捐给慈善机构的失业钢琴师吗？我要回去跟他分那个松饼的。

yingyinNormal.en: What were you thinking? I didn't know it was an auction. What? I figured, take a guess, help a charity, free boat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在想什么？我不知道这是拍卖会。什么？我以为是猜一猜帮助慈善团体，免费得帆船。

yingyinNormal.en: This is not charity. You have to have numbers. People are the best defense against walkers or people. We help each other.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也不是做慈善的 人必须集体行动 人是对抗行尸的最好武器或者对抗其他人 我们互相帮助

yingyinNormal.en: Hey Rach. Are any of you guys free tonight? My boss is hosting this charity event for underprivileged kids and the more people I bring, the better I look. So, Monica? Chandler?
yingyinNormal.zh: 晚上有人有空吗？我老板要主持救助儿童慈善会，我带越多人去越有面子，莫妮卡？钱德？

yingyinNormal.en: I told my neighbor that I had, in fact, founded the charity and I thanked her for the money. But I will deny it if you ever bring that up. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我告诉我的邻居我确实，创立了这个慈善机构并感谢她的捐助。但如果你再提起这件事我不会承认的。好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: My son had gone house to house in the neighborhood for two weeks telling people that he was my son. And that he was raising money for a fictional police charity called Moms and Dads in Blue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的儿子真的两个星期挨家挨户的告诉邻居们他是我儿子。他正在筹款为一个虚构的名叫警察父母慈善机构。

yingyinNormal.en: Judith! Hello. I work for a bank, not a charity, and if your accounts are not settled by the end of the month...
yingyinNormal.zh: 朱迪思！你好。我是银行的雇员，不是慈善家，要是月底之前你还是拖欠不还的话……

yingyinNormal.en: Could you be less enthused? Look, it's a nice gesture. It is. But it just feels like... Like? Charity. Charity?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们为何不高兴啊，各位。你们一番好意，可是我们觉得这像...像？施舍。施舍？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, You know what though you guys? I really appreciate that but I think I'm just gonna take Sebastian to the charity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们知道吗？真是谢谢你们，不过我带赛巴斯钦去就好了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 慈善地；慷慨地；宽恕地
adj. 慈善的；属慈善事业的；慷慨施舍的

word_family.mean: n. 慈善机构；施舍；援助；赈济；仁慈；宽厚；宽容；慈善事业；施舍钱物；赈济钱物

sense_info_list.en: an organization for helping people in need

examination_example.sentence: Buying gifts or giving to <highlight>charity</highlight> is often more pleasurable than purchasing things for oneself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 买礼物或捐赠给慈善机构往往比为自己买东西更令人愉快。

sense_info_list.en: the aim of giving money, food, help, etc. to people who are in need

examination_example.sentence: Suppose your class is to hold a <highlight>charity</highlight> sale for kids in need of help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 假设你的班级要为需要帮助的孩子举办慈善义卖。

sense_info_list.en: kindness and tolerance in judging others

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 慈善的；属慈善事业的；慷慨施舍的

word_family.mean: n. 慈善机构；施舍；援助；赈济；仁慈；宽厚；宽容；慈善事业；施舍钱物；赈济钱物

sense_info_list.en: an organization for helping people in need
sense_info_list.zh: 慈善事业; 慈善机构

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't take donations and doesn't want to be seen as a <highlight>charity</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不接受捐赠，也不想被视为慈善机构。

examination_example.sentence: It donates regularly to a local <highlight>charity</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它定期向当地慈善机构捐款。

sense_info_list.zh: 慈善; 赈济; 施舍

examination_example.sentence: He needed to make some donations to <highlight>charity</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他需要做一些慈善捐赠。

examination_example.sentence: He hopes his acts of <highlight>charity</highlight> will influence others to spread positive actions in their own towns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他希望他的慈善行为能够影响其他人在自己的城镇传播积极的行动。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 宽容; 宽厚; 宽大

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Moved by their pictures, I decided to hold a <highlight>charity</highlight> sale.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 被他们的照片所感动，我决定举行一次义卖。

examination_example.sentence: All of the money will go to <highlight>charity</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有的钱都将捐给慈善机构。
现在他为一家慈善机构工作。
